text: FFI offers a diverse range of skill-building workshops and training programmes, carefully curated to meet the specific needs of participants and industry demands. These programmes cover essential areas such as:
li1: Technical skills: Computer proficiency, software applications (communications, project management, productivity, etc), business analysis, and digital literacy.
li2: Soft skills: Effective communication, teamwork, problem-solving, critical thinking, and leadership.
li3: Where necessary, industry-specific skills: Digital marketing, customer service, entrepreneurship, and emerging technologies.

text: To ensure that participants receive the most relevant support, FFI provides personalised career counselling and guidance. This includes assessments to identify individual strengths and interests, exploration of potential career paths, and development of tailored career plans.

FFI pairs participants with experienced professionals who can offer mentorship, advice, and support throughout their career journey. Mentors provide valuable insights into industry trends, share their own experiences, and help participants navigate the job market.

To increase participants' chances of securing employment, FFI offers a comprehensive range of job placement services. This includes resume building, interview preparation, mock interviews, and networking opportunities to connect participants with potential employers.

For those who aspire to start their own businesses, FFI provides entrepreneurship training and support. This includes workshops on business planning, marketing, finance, and legal considerations. Additionally, FFI offers resources and guidance to help participants develop their entrepreneurial ideas and launch their ventures.
